data.meta_description: Find information on The Master's Touch franchise business opportunities and learn how much it costs to start an The Master's Touch franchise business.  Interested in owning a The Master's Touch franchise?   Find The Master's Touch franchise fees and resources and get help from Franchise Clique representatives.
data.text:
Avoid The Common Pitfalls Of Starting A Small Business From Scratch!

Start with a proven hard surface cleaning & restoration system that provides you the ability to earn a six figure income!

The Master's Touch has helped over 1,100 people in 11 countries start their own business. Will you be next?

We invented and patented the very first hard surface restoration system utilizing an extractor mechanism back in 2000. This device enables you to clean hard surfaces 10 times faster and 10 times easier than traditional cleaning methods.

Find out today why so many people are considering starting their own business with The Master's Touch.This breakthrough has literally unleashed a business opportunity for people like you to capitalize on the huge tile and hard surface-cleaning trend that has been sweeping the country.There is no shortage of customers; everywhere you go there is an opportunity for business. Restaurants, office buildings, malls, stores, schools, gyms, residential homes, apartment buildings ... the list is endless!

We provide a complete turnkey business system based on this patented technology so you can be in business in less than thirty days.

Should You Start Your Own Business?

What is unique about this business is that unlike a franchise, there are no ongoing royalties to pay, low start-up investment and you still receive lifetime support! We also provide onsite training and a realistic SIX-FIGURE INCOME potential your FIRST YEAR.

100% Money Back Guarantee, No Obligation
